title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching between perspectives, the view maximized state in the CVS repository view is lost.
EB: The expected behavior is that when switching perspectives, the maximized state of the CVS repository view should be retained.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the resource perspective. 4. Come back to the Java perspective.
